query:
SELECT 
  id,
  numeroCi,
  tipoServicoCompra,
  valorTotal,
  valorTotal / 100 AS valorReais,
  mesServico,
  YEAR(createdAt) AS ano
FROM despesas_v2
WHERE numeroCi IN ('022/2025', '023/2025', '024/2025')
ORDER BY numeroCi
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT 
  id,
  numeroCi,
  tipoServicoCompra,
  valorTotal,
  valorTotal / 100 AS valorReais,
  mesServico,
  YEAR(createdAt) AS ano
FROM despesas_v2
WHERE numeroCi IN ('022/2025', '023/2025', '024/2025')
ORDER BY numeroCi
